HasFlags.AddIRCMessage: Repulse Sent me, he said that experiment failed and cops got to him
I was assisting Repulse with his personal matter
We will manage Repulse's matter, but as far as I can see you are interested in our group, so allow me to properly introduce us
Jester Sent me, he said that experiment failed and cops got to him
I was assisting Jester with his personal matter
We will manage Jester's matter, but as far as I can see you are interested in our group, so allow me to properly introduce us
